question: In which of the following battles, Shahab-ud-Din defeated Prithviraj Chauhan?
explanation: The Second Battle of Tarain was fought in 1192 by theÂ  Chahamanas and their allies against the Ghurids, near Tarain. Prithviraj Chauhan's forces had defeated Shahab-ud-Din in the First Battle of Tarain in 1191. Shahab-ud-Din repeated the attack next year and defeated Prithviraj Chauhan in the second battle of Tarain.
